mapper.select: select SAL_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, CALL_CNT, REMARK, STS_CD, SAO_ID, PRO_ID, QTY, PRICE, SOL_ID, TRACKING_NO, WSP_NAME from bsp.sal where SAL_ID = #{salId}
select SAL_ID, CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, CALL_CNT, REMARK, STS_CD, SAO_ID, PRO_ID, QTY, PRICE, SOL_ID, TRACKING_NO, WSP_NAME from bsp.sal limit #{offset}, #{limit}
mapper.insert: insert into bsp.sal(CREATED_BY, CREATION_DATE, LAST_UPDATE_BY, LAST_UPDATE_DATE, CALL_CNT, REMARK, STS_CD, SAO_ID, PRO_ID, QTY, PRICE, SOL_ID, TRACKING_NO, WSP_NAME) values (#{createdBy}, #{creationDate}, #{lastUpdateBy}, #{lastUpdateDate}, #{callCnt}, #{remark}, #{stsCd}, #{saoId}, #{proId}, #{qty}, #{price}, #{solId}, #{trackingNo}, #{wspName})
mapper.update:
update bsp.sal
CREATED_BY = #{createdBy},
CREATION_DATE = #{creationDate},
LAST_UPDATE_BY = #{lastUpdateBy},
LAST_UPDATE_DATE = #{lastUpdateDate},
CALL_CNT = #{callCnt},
REMARK = #{remark},
STS_CD = #{stsCd},
SAO_ID = #{saoId},
PRO_ID = #{proId},
QTY = #{qty},
PRICE = #{price},
SOL_ID = #{solId},
TRACKING_NO = #{trackingNo},
WSP_NAME = #{wspName},
where SAL_ID = #{salId}
